pr_title: Show file and folder name in resolve conflict dialog

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <string name="in">in folder %1$s</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="in_folder">in folder %1$s</string>
          
      
    
    
  

rather use a longer, easier to understand string-name
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -946,4 +946,6 @@
     <string name="fourHours">4 hours</string>
     <string name="thisWeek">This week</string>
     <string name="drawer_item_gallery">Media</string>
+    <string name="in">in folder %1$s</string>

timeline.message:
Show folder name in resolve conflict dialog

Signed-off-by: tobiasKaminsky <tobias@kaminsky.me>

Show folder name in resolve conflict dialog

Signed-off-by: tobiasKaminsky <tobias@kaminsky.me>
